title: Emmerdale spoilers: Shock twist as Vinny reveals he's not Mandy's son
text:
Mandy Dingle (Lisa Riley) and son Vinny (Bradley Johnson) have been harbouring plenty of secrets since returning to Emmerdale several months back, but the pair have been sitting on a pretty game-changing one — as Vinny revealed during tonight’s episode that Mandy’s not actually his mum!

Mandy’s been incredibly secretive since her return, and last week it came to light that she’s in desperate need of some cash, as casino boss Terry is on her back. After discovering Lydia (Karen Blick) had some cash to her name, Mandy set about acquiring said cash, and made off with it during last night’s episode — much to the Dingles’ dismay.

However, tonight Mandy and Vinny were apprehended by the Dingles, and brought back to the village so that they could get to the bottom of why they stole from Lydia.

Dingle Court was called to session, and — in spite of her hesitation to reveal the truth — Mandy eventually came clean, and viewers saw her dodgy deals unfold for themselves via a series of flashbacks — where it was revealed that Charity (Emma Atkins) also took part in said dodgy activities!

As the Dingles deliberated over Mandy and Vinny’s fate, the pair discussed how the family won’t turn their back on one of their own — a conversation which led to Vinny revealing that he’s not actually Mandy’s child!

The Dingles are yet to discover the truth, but this revelation does beg the question of who exactly Vinny is?

Could his alliance with Mandy simply be a part of another scam?

Perhaps, but Mandy seems to genuinely care for Vinny, so there’s likely more to it than just that.

Emmerdale continues Wednesday 30thOctober at 7pm on ITV.
